description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:
Enhancements

NETWORKNET-34513
ExchangeClient: Improvement in MoveItem method
NETWORKNET-34521
Add case-sensitive filtering for Imap client.
NETWORKNET-34522
Add case-sensitive filtering for Pop3 client.
NETWORKNET-34523
Add case-sensitive filtering for Exchange client.
NETWORKNET-34526
Exchange: Provide the capability to set Timezone on Exchange Task
NETWORKNET-34534
Setting Exchange Format address in SenderEmailAddress property gives error

Bugs

NETWORKNET-34505
MSG attachment class changes from IPM.Note.Templates.Oof.Microsoft to IPM.Note while sending to EWS
NETWORKNET-34532
WriteCompleteEmailAddressToMht writes additional unwanted email address
NETWORKNET-34506
MapiMessage created with MapiRecepient doesn't open in Outlook
NETWORKNET-34511
Message with Empty subject when added to PST doesn't open in Outlook
NETWORKNET-34512
Contact Notes formatting issues for comma and colon when added to PST
NETWORKNET-34514
MapiMessage to MailMessage removes the Table and disturbs Text formatting style in table
NETWORKNET-34516
Bayesian DB of SpamAnalyzer contains NaN values of probabilities when training filter only by not spam.
NETWORKNET-34517
Creating PST using AE 4.6 is slower than AE 4.5.0
NETWORKNET-34519
Appointment saved using Aspose.Email converts Hebrew characters to Gibbrish
NETWORKNET-34520
Resaving ICS shows differences in output
NETWORKNET-34528
Pop3Client doens't work with Hotmail after Aspose.Email 4.2
NETWORKNET-34531
EML->MSG: Attachments names change
NETWORKNET-34533
Some named properties stripped while reading a message from PST
NETWORKNET-34504
AppendMessage() to EWS changes the message date to current date
NETWORKNET-34524
Message created by AE saved in wrong mailbox sent folder after sending
NETWORKNET-34501
Appointment time differ while saving EML->EML using MailMessage
NETWORKNET-34507
OLE Attachments not managed properly with Aspose.Email
NETWORKNET-34508
Resaving MSG file using Aspose.Email causes the embedded image to be lost
NETWORKNET-34502
Saving calendar item to MemorySream raises exception "KeyNotFound"
NETWORKNET-34515
EWS.FetchMessage: System.FormatException: An invalid character was found in the mail header raised
NETWORKNET-34530
MapiMessage.FromFile raises System.IndexOutOfRangeException
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
